Ooaman

I'm wondering what are your favorite musical instruments. I'm allowing you to vote more than once. This is either playing or listening. The choices are...[*]Drums[*]Guitars (Includes Telecasters, Stratacasters, Electric, Accoustic, 12 string.)[*]Bass Guitar[*]Keyboard (Includes Organ, piano, electirc keyboard)[*]Brass Instruments (Trumpets, Saxaphone, French Horn, ect.)[*]String instruments (Violin, Chello, ect.)[*]Computerized instruments, for those who like Techno or various other digitally produced music.I'm sure there are others, but I assume those would be the more popular ones.
Matthew S
I pretty much like them all
Heads_On_Pikes

I have always loved the sound of rock 'n roll music with horns in it for some odd reason.
 
 Chicago (or was it Boston?:p ) comes to mind quickly as well as Steely Dan. Springsteen with Clarence Clemons.
 
 That said, the guitar is the heart and soul of rock 'n roll IMHO.
Voldy
its piano all the way, nooo doubtemoticon_xgood
snakespit
I love playing guitar, and in my opinion, nothing sounds better in an acoustic format.
Justawoman
Drums and then the Spanish Guitar. Also a banjo has a unique sound.
Ooaman

I am partial to the Rock'n'Roll instruments (Drums, guitars, bass guitar, and keyboard instruments.) I have no problem with the other instruments, I'm just partial to those. I personally like the drums the most myself. When I was in middle school, I was in choir and we did an African style song and I played a little beat drum for that. So drums would be my strongest choice with the others coming in nearly tied at second.
 
I have always loved the sound of rock 'n roll music with horns in it for some odd reason.
 
 Chicago (or was it Boston?:p ) comes to mind...

 Ha ha, very funny. Did you remember to pay before you pumped that one out?emoticon_xclown
Inyx
I like string instruments, most of them, though my favorite is the violin(s). Although lately I developed an appreciation for the saxophone.
Master_Shake

I didn't vote, because I can't really say that I have a favorite. I play guitar, but I also want to learn just about every other instrument.:)
 
 By the way, I highly disagree with your inclusion of computers as an instrument.:xcensored
earthd320

Guitar because it's relaxing to play (acoustic). Also, it's good to rock out to when necessary (electric). I also like brass instruments because you included the saxophone in that category. Although I don't agree that computers are instruments.
Ooaman

I didn't vote, because I can't really say that I have a favorite. I play guitar, but I also want to learn just about every other instrument.:)

 Do you know that I set it up so you can vote for more than one. You could vote for all of them if you wanted to.
 
By the way, I highly disagree with your inclusion of computers as an instrument.:xcensored

 
Although I don't agree that computers are instruments.

 Jokingly: Well, they do have a keyboard.:p
 
 Seriously: I'm not really a big fan of it myself. But I thought I'd include it since computers or otherwise electronically induced music does have a fairly strong following. I'd thought I'd go ahead and put it up for the people that prefer it. I guess, now that I think of it, I could have also added "Human Voice" for people who like accapella or maybe "Body produced music" for those who like music (mostly in the 50's or so) where the main beat comes from snapping fingers or clapping hands (or maybe even tap dancing.)
Master_Shake

Do you know that I set it up so you can vote for more than one. You could vote for all of them if you wanted to.

 Well fine then. I just might do that :p 
 
Jokingly: Well, they do have a keyboard.:p

 Very funny:) 
 
Seriously: I'm not really a big fan of it myself. But I thought I'd include it since computers or otherwise electronically induced music does have a fairly strong following.

 So did Hitler.
 
or maybe "Body produced music" for those who like music (mostly in the 50's or so) where the main beat comes from snapping fingers or clapping hands (or maybe even tap dancing.)

 Just so you know, that's called Doo Wop.
Bell

The oboe is my favorite! I've been playing for sixteen years. It is a woodwind instrument. Incidentally, the saxophone is in the woodwind family as well. 
 
 I also really enjoy playing the harp. I've got a three and a half octave lever harp, but I learned on a full size Lyon and Healy.
 
 Computers/synthesizers must be counted as musical instruments. Although I'm a purist, I have to respect what the latest technology can provide for us musically. Synthesized instruments have come a long way!
Dono

Since I like to sing and do it often, I went to a voice teacher for an evaluation of my potential. After listening to me sing, she suggested that I learn to accompany myself ........ on the harmonica. I do like reed instruments.
 Dono
Cheesejoff
Electric Guitar is my personal instrument of choice...although I'm probably better on the old acoustic.
